CIRCULAR NO. 05 / 2009 
 
In continuation to this Bureau Circular No. 29/2002 dated 24/9/2002,  
One Armed Personal Security Officer of Shri Pranab Mukherjee, Minister of 
External Affairs & Finance, Govt of India, is permitted to carry his weapon 
and ammunition on his person or in his hand  baggage on board the flight 
within the country till further order. 
 
2. 
The weapon shall be carried in fully unloaded condition i.e weapon 
and ammunition shall be kept separately while accompanying the dignitary 
on board the aircraft. 
 
 
 
 
 
(M. Malaviya) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
